name: cnn.co.jp 調整
css:
@-moz-document domain("cnn.co.jp") {
.ad-large-top,
.ad-txt,
#gdpr_area,
.list-service,
footer,
.breadcrumbs,
a.ttl-link,
.story-video-btm, .story-photo-btm, .side-recommend-editor,
#nav-global .login,
.search,
#ad-bottom-rect,
.cb-l1-m2,

.pg-container-side,


.story-sns-top, .story-sns-btm,
[id*="logly-lift"],
.uz-cnn_pc,
.uae_outstreamplayer,
.uz-2-cnn_pc .__uz__widget,
#dacivttarget,
.cb-l1-m2-wrapper,
.sns,
#_popIn_recommend
{display:none !important;}

.pg-container-sidefix .pg-container-main
{max-width:89%; margin:0 auto}

.pg-container-sidefix .pg-container-side.cb-l2:nth-of-type(even)
{margin:0 10px;}


.ttl-headline-top
{font-size:28px;}
.story-media-main p,
article .left.img-xxxl, article .right.img-xxxl, article .center.img-xxxl
{font-size:11px;}
article p
{font-size:15px;}
.list-news-line li
{font-size:15px; font-weight:bold; padding:5px 0;}
.category-wrapper .cd .cd-ttl
{font-weight:bold;}

}
